Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: large main room

The main room of an ominous haunted manor is dark and foreboding. There are cobwebs strung everywhere. A few candelabras barely illuminate the area. The room is sparsely furnished in comparison to its grand size with a side table against the east wall, a rocking chair in the northeast corner, a buffet table in the center, and few scattered rickety chairs. An open archway in the northwest corner leads to a stairwell. A chipped, wooden door in the southeast corner leads outside.
A large main room of a haunted manor.

The main room of an ominous haunted manor is dark and foreboding. There are cobwebs strung everywhere. A few candelabras barely illuminate the area. The room is sparsely furnished in comparison to its grand size. An open archway in the northwest corner leads to a stairwell. A chipped, wooden door in the southeast corner leads outside.
open archway
An open archway gapes in the northwest corner and leads to a stairwell. It is carved from the wall; marred by peeling and chipped plaster.
An open archway gapes in the northwest corner and leads to a stairwell.
the chipped, wooden main door

A chipped, wooden door in the southeast corner leads outside. It bears several intricate yet worn carvings which show it was originally built with great care. The carvings no longer bear any resemblance to their original intent and are merely worn gouges in the wood.
A chipped, wooden door in the southeast corner leads outside.
large bone pile

A large number of bones have been unevenly piled in the southwest corner of the room. A few skulls emptily stare into the distance from beneath splintered ossein fragments. Here-and-there, an occasional twisted spine or broken humerus peeks outward from the mass.
A large number of bones have been unevenly piled in the southwest corner of the room.
glass inlaid buffet table
A long buffet table designed with wrought iron and topped with several panes of clear glass. The wrought iron is formed into curlicues at every possible juncture without design or purpose.
A long buffet table designed with wrought iron and topped with several panes of clear glass.
rickety willow branch chair

One of a few rickety chairs around the room. It was loving crafted from willow branches with a mesh style seat, four legs, and a heart-shaped backrest. Sadly, time has had its toll and the chair is almost completely dilapidated. Sit at your own risk.
One of a few rickety chairs around the room. It was loving crafted from willow branches with a mesh style seat, four legs, and a heart-shaped backrest.
rickety willow branch chair

One of a few rickety chairs around the room. It was loving crafted from willow branches with a mesh style seat, four legs, and a heart-shaped backrest.
some rickety willow branch chairs

A few rickety chairs around the room. They were loving crafted from willow branches with a mesh style seat, four legs, and a heart-shaped backrest. Sadly, time has had its toll and the chairs are almost completely dilapidated. Sit at your own risk.
A few rickety chairs around the room. They were loving crafted from willow branches with a mesh style seat, four legs, and a heart-shaped backrest.
stone side table
A chiseled granite side table which stands against the east wall. It is a very plain, long table wrought from a heavy stone; held aloft by four nondescript legs.
A chiseled granite side table which stands against the east wall.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{Heavy footsteps can be heard echoing throughout the room, but you can't pinpoint where they're coming from.\|The chipped, wooden main door suddenly swings open before slamming unaccountably.\|A quill and inkpot continuously disappear from and reappear in random locations with no apparent cause.\|The candelabras die out momentarily before flickering to life once again, seemingly on their own.\|The unmistakeable scent of a strange perfume lingers on the air.\|The subtle sound of knocking can be heard from the northern wall.\|The sound of a glass shattering reaches your ears, but nothing looks out of place or broken.\|You're certain one of the nearby chairs just moved a foot or two from its original position.\|You catch the image of a fleeting shadow out of the corner of your eye.\|A shadowy shape, vaguely in the form of a dog, skirts the southern edge of the room before disappearing from view.\|You get the strange sensation that you're being watched.\|Something unexpectedly touches your hair and drifts down your nape.\|A muffled voice can be distantly heard, desperately pleading for it's mother.\|The jars of animal parts slide across the table to safely teeter on one of the edges.\|An indistinguishably-shaped mist appears for mere seconds before quickly disappearing again into nonexistence.\}

X[S] \{Heavy footsteps can be heard echoing throughout the room, but you can't pinpoint where they're coming from.\|The chipped, wooden main door suddenly swings open before slamming unaccountably.\|A quill and inkpot continuously disappear from and reappear in random locations with no apparent cause.\|The candelabras die out momentarily before flickering to life once again, seemingly on their own.\|The unmistakeable scent of a strange perfume lingers on the air.\|The subtle sound of knocking can be heard from the northern wall.\|The sound of a glass shattering reaches your ears, but nothing looks out of place or broken.\|You're certain one of the nearby chairs just moved a foot or two from its original position.\|You catch the image of a fleeting shadow out of the corner of your eye.\|A shadowy shape, vaguely in the form of a dog, skirts the southern edge of the room before disappearing from view.\|You get the strange sensation that you're being watched.\|Something unexpectedly touches your hair and drifts down your nape.\|A muffled voice can be distantly heard, desperately pleading for it's mother.\|The jars of animal parts slide across the table to safely teeter on one of the edges.\|An indistinguishably-shaped mist appears for mere seconds before quickly disappearing again into nonexistence.\}
